Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory4.jpg'}
{3: 'You stand at the landing zone and watch the transport craft take off.'}
{3: 'In the FOB erected by the vanguard forces, numerous teams are moving about the base, strengthening fortifications and adjusting comm lines.'}

{3: 'Corrupted remains piled outside of the base allude to a small conflict while the base was being erected. A tall Construct is throwing debris on either side of the street to clear a passageway for personnel and vehicles.'}
{3: "This area had been engulfed in the flames of war like most human cities on the Earth's surface, now standing in silence as the surface falls into desolation."}
{3: 'Corrupted intermittently scurry down the street toward the base only to be immediately blown to pieces by the defense turrets.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "The base's defenses are sufficient enough to fight off the few Corrupted wandering outside the city.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Actually, a horde of Corrupted are making their way to the city center. That's our target for this mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's report for duty first.", 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Right, the temp HQ should be... Ah, over there.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Lucia checks her surroundings, then fixes her eyes on a makeshift building in the center of the base. The white flowers and pink ribbons on the exterior of the temporary headquarters serve as a stark contrast with the surrounding charred city ruins.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Someone's sure got a strange taste.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't assume, Lee. Maybe they serve a special purpose.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Alright, go report for duty. I'm going to scout the surrounding area.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Alright. We'll leave the reconnaissance to you then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Before Lucia could finish speaking, Lee had already turned to leave the base.'}
{2: "Liv? What's going on?", 3: '32'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Uh... It's nothing... Let's go report in...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{3: "The HQ's interior is far more spacious than expected. A woman is in the center of numerous display panels. A hologram of the city fills the space outside of the screens."}
{3: 'The woman furiously taps the screens, displaying various data on the city hologram, such as Corrupted distribution, weapon deployment and material allocation with each tap.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Gray Raven, reporting for duty.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia, who was walking in front, speaks first. Hearing Lucia, the woman stops tapping the screens with both hands.'}
{3: 'She speaks as she pushes aside the display panel in front of her. Her eyes fall directly on the Gray Ravens walking into the HQ.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Oh, THOSE Gray Ravens! Looks like you really are on the roster for this mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "It's been a while, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You know each other, Commandant?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "BAHAHA! I guess that's to be expected from you, Chief.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Why would you care about those who can't keep up?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Nothing. Maybe this'll jog your memory.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Should I be honored that you remember me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Nothing. I was just remembering a few things during our time at F.O.S.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Let me re-introduce myself. My name is Vanessa, commandant of Egret and chief commander of this operation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Regardless of your past accolades, Commandant, you better follow my orders as the chief commander.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Egret... Isn't that—?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa rises from her seat, crosses the city hologram suspended in mid-air, and slowly approaches the Gray Ravens.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Yes... The team Liv used to be a part of.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Seems you're still using the frame I had recalibrated for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Why appear before me as Lux? Miss me that much?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "That's not the reason.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Pfff, didn't I teach you to keep your mouth shut?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "【kuroname】, the Constructs on your team aren't all this insubordinate. Are they?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Saying this, Vanessa slowly lifts her hand as if to touch Liv.'}
{3: "Noticing Vanessa's intent, you take a step forward and catch Vanessa by the wrist."}
{2: 'Chief, discuss the mission at hand.', 3: '89', 4: '...', 5: '91'}
{3: "Also sensing Vanessa's intent, Lucia prepares to draw the blade sheathed on her arm at any moment and lunge forward. However, you step forward and catch Vanessa by the wrist."}
{2: 'Chief, discuss the mission at hand.', 3: '89', 4: '...', 5: '91'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Heh. I don't know why, but I sure get a kick out of hearing the commandant call me that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Oh? Can't even bring yourself to have a little chit-chat with me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Focus on the mission, please.', 3: '93'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Hmph. I see you're still as boring as always.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Regardless, shouldn't a doll be punished for disobeying their master?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'They are my comrades. There is no such thing as a "master."', 3: '99'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Comrades? You really haven't changed a bit.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "But if that's how you view them, I have no interest in getting involved. After all, they're your playthings anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Constructs aren\'t "playthings" built to serve.', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Comrades to you, toys to me. Family to him, tools to her. It's irrelevant. Each team interacts differently.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'At any rate, the powers that be only care about completing the mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "But there's still one thing I'd like to say...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa leans in and whispers into your ear.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Don't worry, you can cut the act.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "You can kick 'em to the curb whenever you've had your fun.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Even the most beautiful of toys is worthless if it refuses to listen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Compared to such an exquisite dollhouse, they belong in the dump. Do they not?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Vaness... Chief, please focus on the mission.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv suddenly steps in between you and Vanessa. Looking outside the headquarters, she signals you with her gaze.'}
{3: 'The confrontation had already stirred up quite the audience of onlookers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Hmph, why let go so easily? Hold on a little longer if you'd like. After all, it'd give others a chance to see another side of you, Chief.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa gently rubs her wrist, smiling at you and Liv.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Chief, the Gray Ravens await your orders.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia's loud voice suddenly comes from behind Vanessa. Vanessa scowls and turns to reprimand Lucia."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Did I give you permission to interrupt?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Apologies for interrupting you, but the Corrupted threat still hasn't been alleviated. We must focus our efforts on the mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Neglecting one's duty may be detrimental to the success of the mission. If the higher-ups want to point fingers, you'll be shouldering the blame as the chief commander.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vanessa quietly sighs, then returns to her seat surrounded by screens.'}
{3: 'With a gentle tap of the screen, the Gray Raven symbol appears above the hologram of the city.'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: 'Gray Ravens, breach 35th to 42nd Street in Zone B.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "There are far more Corrupted concentrated in this area than the surroundings. But, I'm sure that won't be an issue for your team. Right, Chief?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Understood.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vanessa', 3: "Good. Don't disappoint me, Gray Ravens.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gray Ravens, move out.', 3: '138'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{3: 'As the Gray Ravens depart, the other teams originally gathered outside of the headquarters return to their respective posts.'}
{3: 'Vanessa types on a screen as she watches the Gray Ravens leave.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vanessa', 3: '【kuroname】, how long do you think you can live out this naive fantasy of yours?', 4: '1'}
